txt.en: '[placeholder]! I am pleased to see you, though I will not say that I am surprised... our paths seem destined to cross at the most opportune times.\n\n'We have only just arrived ourselves. Indeed, it seems that we are both here to see the Reeve, Fastred. Would you join me?'
'Well, we have come a long way, only to find the master of the house absent.'

'You have come too late. Reeve Fastred is abroad, hunting Orcs. If you wish to speak with him, I can show on your map where his camp lies.\n\n'Here... though I doubt you will find a warm welcome. His mood has been harsh of late, and a thirst for blood has been upon him.'
You have encountered the Riders Four once more in Snowbourn, capital of the Sutcrofts.
Talk to the doorwarden at the Mead Hall of Snowbourn
The doorwarden stands before the doors to the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should seek entrance to the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.
Talk to Burnoth outside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn
Burnoth stands outside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should speak with Burnoth and discover what to do next.
